level.text: A dissolved limited cooperative association that has completed winding up may deliver to the Mayor for filing a statement of termination that states:
The date of filing of its initial articles of organization; and
The filing of a statement of termination shall not itself terminate the limited cooperative association.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For history of Law 18-378, see notes under ยง 29-101.01.

level.heading: Uniform Law:
level.text: This section is based on ยง 1215 of the Uniform Limited Cooperative Association Act . See Vol. 6A , Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition or ULA Database on Westlaw.
